__NOTOC__ float '''GetCrouchFactor''' (int ''ptr'')
== Usage == Gets the crouch multiplier for the height of an actor. This is meaningless to actors that are not players.
Note that this function is to be used where an [[DECORATE expressions|expression]] is expected. It is mostly useful when combined with {{c|[[A_JumpIf]]}} or [[Actor_states#Anonymous_Functions|Anonymous Functions]].
== Parameters == * ''ptr'': The pointer to check.
=== Return value === Returns 1 for actors that are not players, or players not crouching. A value of 0.5, for example, indicates a player is crouching.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
